quotes.quote: Temples are an expression of God's love.
quotes.name: -Jean A. Stevens-

quotes.quote: The real power of the temple is in the ordinances.
quotes.name: -Kent F. Richards-

quotes.quote: If you have possible access to a temple, I urge you to find a way to regularly make an appointment with the Lord.
quotes.name: -Russel M. Nelson-

quotes.quote: Here you will find personal power, power to change, power to repent, power to learn.
quotes.name: -Dale G. Renlund-

quotes.quote: The temple is a constant reminder that God wants the family to be eternal.
quotes.name: -Ezra Taft Benson-
